column1: #Text=No acid pre-treatment was employed in Runs 15 through 23.
#Text=Peroxymonophosphoric acid was prepared as in Run 1 of Example 1, but using the following initial mixture:
#Text=After cooling, 1.8 g of sodium hydroxide was added to the reaction mixture to produce a pH of 2.2, and the solution was then analyzed.
#Text=This solution was used to delignify milled aspen wood as in Run 1, except that a reaction temperature of 50.degree.
#Text=C. and a reaction time of 5 hours were employed.
#Text=Results for this Run and all other runs of Example 3 are given in Table 1.
#Text=Peroxymonophosphoric acid was prepared as in Run 15, except that 1.9 g of sodium hydroxide was added to the cooled reaction mixture to produce a pH of 4.2.
#Text=This solution was used to delignify milled aspen wood as in Run 15, except that a reaction time of 25 hours was used.
